ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Who I Am
ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.P: Hi there. I’m Alex, a structured and detail-oriented web developer in training with a strong passion for creating meaningful and user-focused applications.
ABOUT.INFO_1: I’m based in Hanover and am also open to remote work.
ABOUT.INFO_2: I enjoy turning ideas into real projects and continuously strengthening my skills through hands-on learning. I’m especially passionate about building modern web solutions and exploring new technologies.
ABOUT.INFO_3: When I approach a challenge, I like to break it down analytically and explore different solutions until I find the most effective one. I stay persistent when things get tricky and make sure to learn from every step along the way. If you’re looking for someone who’s curious, reliable, and motivated to grow with every challenge, I’m the right person to work with.

SKILLS.SUBTITLE: Technologies
SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.P_1: As a junior front-end developer, I’ve gained experience working on a variety of projects where I built responsive and intuitive user interfaces. I enjoy turning ideas into functional, well-structured solutions and consistently improving the way I work. I’m always open to learning new technologies and am currently expanding my skills into backend development on my path toward becoming a full-stack developer.
SKILLS.P_2: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECT.SUBTITLE: What is this project about?
PROJECT.INFO_PROJECT_1: This Pokedex-App uses the Pokemon REST-API to access and display the entire Pokemon database.
PROJECT.INFO_PROJECT_2: Task manager tool inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks, assign users and categories.
PROJECT.INFO_PROJECT_3: Side-Scroller game based on object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to fight against different underwater animals.

REVIEW.SUBTITLE: What my colleagues say about me
REVIEW.REVIEW_1: Working with Alex was a great experience — he was always willing to help and stayed highly motivated when challenges came up. His persistence in finding the right solution made a real difference for the whole team.
REVIEW.REVIEW_2: Alex has a talent for explaining complex topics in a simple and understandable way. This made it much easier to follow the project's progress and move forward efficiently as a team.
REVIEW.REVIEW_3: Alex consistently kept an overview of tasks and priorities, which brought clarity and structure to the project. Thanks to his organized approach, collaboration felt smooth and well-coordinated.
